properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c2 v2 c2 v3 c2 v4 c2 v5 c2 v6 c2 v7 c2 v8 c2 v9 c2 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neeru kattina thota vale Neeti ootavale nundedavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee devude ninnu thrupti chesi Nee emukalanu balaparachunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unnatha lokaana mee peru Unna danute mana santoshamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aananda mondumu Yehovaalo Aayane theerchunu nee vaanchalu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vedina doraku nede meeku Nindaina sakala santoshamu{/lang-eng}
